title: Vegetarian Moroccan stew
ingredients: ['For the spice mixture', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '1 teaspoon coarse salt, or to taste', '1/2 teaspoon ground ginger', '1/4 teaspoon ground cloves', '1/4 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '1/4 teaspoon ground turmeric', '1/8 teaspoon curry powder', 'For the vegetable stew', '1 tablespoon butter', '1 sweet onion, chopped', '130g finely shredded kale', '1.5 litres vegetable stock', '1 (400g) tin chickpeas, drained', '1 (400g) tin chopped tomatoes', '3 large potatoes, peeled and diced', '2 sweet potatoes, peeled and diced', '4 large carrots,peeled and sliced', '200g dried lentils, rinsed', '65g dried apricots, chopped', '1 tablespoon honey', '1 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper, to taste', '1 tablespoon cornflour (optional)', '1 tablespoon water (optional)']
